title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
writer: Chris Bremner, Will Beall, George Gallo
short_cast: Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Vanessa Hudgens, Alexander Ludwig, Paola Núñez, Eric Dane, Ioan Gruffudd, Jacob Scipio, Melanie Liburd, Tasha Smith, Joe Pantoliano, Tiffany Haddish, John Salley
cast: Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Vanessa Hudgens, Alexander Ludwig, Paola Núñez, Eric Dane, Ioan Gruffudd, Jacob Scipio, Melanie Liburd, Tasha Smith, Joe Pantoliano, Tiffany Haddish, John Salley
genre: Crime Movies, Comedy Movies, Action & Adventure Movies, US Movies
desc: When a mysterious enemy frames their late captain for corruption, Miami cops Mike and Marcus go rogue to expose a conspiracy — and clear their own names.
